name: PURE BLACK 3D: The Novel
description:
The novelization of PURE BLACK 3D has arrived!

There is a nauseous lights and loud noises going on recently. You have checked and monitored the neighbors. All of the lights and noises are coming from the neighboring house across the street. However there is one issue: there is only an abandoned car, and all of the windows of the home are pure black! This changes when this early morning, you spot a shine out of the corner of your eye. A green light, out of the house's attic. Now is the time to get back at the mysterious dangers that invade the allegedly empty home.
